sentences.english: Jenny, let's start with you. We need an experienced reporting analyst.
sentences.chinese: 就從你開始吧，我們需要一個資深的報告分析師。

sentences.english: That the more senior engineers in our team got interrupted more often just exacerbated the situation.
sentences.chinese: 對於運維團隊內的資深工程師來說這個問題更加突出。

sentences.english: Our newspaper has an old-timey correspondent in New York.
sentences.chinese: 本報在紐約駐有一位資深通訊記者。

sentences.english: Dalian Medical University associate adjunct professor, senior medical skin beauty expert.
sentences.chinese: 大連醫科大學兼職副教授，資深皮膚醫學美容專家。

sentences.english: Both Abdul Rohim and his wife Nuraeni are senior employees of the local recycling station.
sentences.chinese: 阿布都和太太諾艾妮都是環保站的資深員工。

sentences.english: The senior revolutionary can play the situation coldly.
sentences.chinese: 資深的革命者冷靜地對付局勢。

sentences.english: Longtime Lakers consultant Tex Winter is planning to attend.
sentences.chinese: 湖人資深顧問德克斯溫特打算要參加本次盛會。

sentences.english: Two veteran communication educators, Prof. Timothy Yu and Mr. Raymond R. Wong are named "Pioneers in Communication Education".
sentences.chinese: 獎頒予資深傳理教育工作者餘也魯教授和黃應士先生。

sentences.english: I am Qual - Kehk, the Senior Man-At-Arms of Harrogath.
sentences.chinese: 我是夸爾凱克，哈洛加斯的資深重騎兵。

sentences.english: So I was promoted from senior designer to the supervisor of planning department.
sentences.chinese: 我的職務也由資深設師升爲企劃部主管。

sentences.english: The leader of the Opposition appoints senior Opposition MPs to form the Shadow Cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 反對黨領袖也會任命資深反對黨組成“影子內閣”。

sentences.english: Two senior Senators on the Armed Services Committee beg to differ.
sentences.chinese: 軍事上的兩個委員會的資深參議員不敢苟同。

sentences.english: 'He tells you you are a nematode, ' said one senior media executive.
sentences.chinese: 一位資深媒體高管說，他告訴你，你是一個低等生物。

sentences.english: President Ronald LU presented a Certificate of Fellowship to Mr. Wong KIM Wing Ball.
sentences.chinese: 呂元祥會長頒贈資深會員證書予黃劍榮建築師。

sentences.english: Overall plan for the park RTKL senior experts from the United States will see.
sentences.chinese: 園區總體規劃由美國RTKL資深專家擔綱。

sentences.english: TD Waterhouse educational seminars - invest with confidence for beginners and experienced investors!
sentences.chinese: 宏達理財投資講座，讓剛起步和資深投資者更添信心。

peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
